detaileddescription.para: Gamedev Framework (gf) is a game framework, it provides some useful features for developping 2D games. Here is a short list of some of the main features of gf:

listitem.para:
Core
Vector and matrix library
Geometry library
Noise library
Easings

Window
Multiple monitors handling
Complete window events
Complete input events, including gamepads
Easy fullscreen

Graphics
Views (a.k.a. cameras)
Sprites and animated sprites
Text and fonts
NinePatch
Sprite batch
Texture atlas
Tile layers
Post-processing effects
Immediate mode GUI
Particles

Game
Resource loader
Application messages
Simple physics engine
Roguelike toolkit and console

detaileddescription.para: If you are looking for a full game engine, you should take a look at the list of game engines on Wikipedia.
